name: FriendIt
description:
Social media helps us to make connections with infinitely many people. In this game, your goal is to friend as many people as possible. Enjoy reading people's posts and friend those that you like. You start off with one friend, and become friends with their friends.

Click on profiles to read their posts and get an idea of what they like. 

Request to be friends with those that you like, and if they choose to accept, you can begin currying favour with their friends, and so the cycle continues…

Controls: Clicking to interact with elements and WASD to use the camera

Submitted by:

Patrick Davis - Coding

Nick Fan - Coding

Cindy Lin - Art
